public Event(String description, String from, String to) {
return String.format("[E]%s (from: %s to: %s)%n", super.toString(), this.from, this.to);
return "The description, /from, or /to of an event cannot be empty.";

System.out.printf("Now you have %d tasks in the list.\n", count);
System.out.println("Bye. Hope to see you again!\n");
